mapper.select: select trunc(sysdate)-to_date(regdate) as withdate from tblmember where memberseq = #{seq}
select distinct to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')as sysyear, to_char(sysdate,'mm')as sysmonth from tblmember

select r.name as pastRoutineName from tblRoutineState rs inner join tblRoutine r on rs.routineseq = r.routineSeq inner join tblSuccess s on rs.routinestateseq = s.routinestateseq where rs.memberseq = #{seq} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(rs.startdate,'yyyy') and to_char(sysdate,'mm') = to_char(rs.startdate,'mm') and sysdate > rs.startdate

select r.name as nowRoutineName from tblRoutineState rs inner join tblRoutine r on rs.routineseq = r.routineSeq inner join tblSuccess s on rs.routinestateseq = s.routinestateseq where rs.memberseq = #{seq} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(rs.startdate,'yyyy') and to_char(sysdate,'mm') = to_char(rs.startdate,'mm') and rs.startdate > sysdate
